00027 // -*- Mode : c++; tab-width: 2; c-tab-always-indent: t; indent-tabs-mode: nil; c-basic-offset: 2 -*-
00028 
00029 #include "Mesquite.hpp"
00030 #include "mesquite_version.h"
00031 
00032 const char* Mesquite::version_string(bool)
00033 {
00034   return MSQ_VERSION_STRING;
00035 }
00036 
00037 unsigned int Mesquite::major_version_number()
00038 {
00039   return MSQ_VERSION_MAJOR;
00040 }
00041 
00042 unsigned int Mesquite::minor_version_number()
00043 {
00044   return MSQ_VERSION_MINOR;
00045 }
00046 
00047 unsigned int Mesquite::patch_version_number()
00048 {
00049 #ifdef MSQ_VERSION_PATCH
00050   return MSQ_VERSION_PATCH;
00051 #else
00052   return 0;
00053 #endif
00054 }
00055 
00056 Mesquite::ReleaseType Mesquite::release_type()
00057 {  
00058 #if MSQ_VERSION_MINOR == 99
00059   return Mesquite::ALPHA;
00060 #elif defined(MSQ_VERSION_PATCH)
00061   return Mesquite::RELEASE;
00062 #else
00063   return Mesquite::BETA;
00064 #endif
00065 }
